author: gakonst
content: Can we get a progress update from people on 7702?

author: bridge-bot
content: <dankrad> Since it seems that our biggest concern with increasing the number of blocks is that self builders are getting reorged, I thought about a few ways in which we can make self-builders life easier and massively decrease their chance of getting reorged when including blobs: https://notes.ethereum.org/@dankrad/self-builder-strategies
